## parseDeclarationFile() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Parses a declaration file from a file path and extracts all exported symbols.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function parseDeclarationFile(filePath: string, options?: ParseOptions): ModuleAnalysisWithTypes;
```
